subtests.name: pen pointerevent attributes
pen pointerover.type should be pointerover
pen pointerover.button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerover.buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerover.clientX and .clientY attributes are correct.
pen pointerover.pointerType is correct.
pen pointerover event is a PointerEvent event
pen pointerover.fromElement value is null
pen pointerover.toElement value is null
pen pointerover.isTrusted value is true
pen pointerover.composed value is valid
pen pointerover.bubbles value is valid
pen pointerover.cancelable value is valid
pen pointerover.pressure value is valid
pen pointerover.isPrimary attribute is true.
pen pointerenter.type should be pointerenter
pen pointerenter.button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerenter.buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerenter.clientX and .clientY attributes are correct.
pen pointerenter.pointerType is correct.
pen pointerenter event is a PointerEvent event
pen pointerenter.fromElement value is null
pen pointerenter.toElement value is null
pen pointerenter.isTrusted value is true
pen pointerenter.composed value is valid
pen pointerenter.bubbles value is valid
pen pointerenter.cancelable value is valid
pen pointerenter.pressure value is valid
pen pointerenter.isPrimary attribute is true.
pen pointerenter.pointerId should be the same as previous pointer events for this active pointer.

pen pointerup.type should be pointerup
pen pointerup.button attribute is 0 when left mouse button is just released.
pen pointerup.buttons attribute is 0 when left mouse button is just released.

pen pointerup.pointerType is correct.
pen pointerup event is a PointerEvent event
pen pointerup.fromElement value is null

pen pointerup.isTrusted value is true
pen pointerup.composed value is valid
pen pointerup.bubbles value is valid
pen pointerup.cancelable value is valid
pen pointerup.pressure value is valid
pen pointerup properties for pointerup
pen pointerup.isPrimary attribute is true.
pen pointerup.pointerId should be the same as previous pointer events for this active pointer.
